ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (03:52): (There's no CSS files in it)
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (03:53): There's lots of inline <style>s, though

ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (03:54): It's not limited to <style>s, so it finds zillions of unhelpful matches
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (03:55): like URL fragments, and numeric character references
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (03:55): Well, I've got something else running that should hopefully cough up results over the weekend.
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (03:56): (I assume you wanted it to be a case-insensitive regexp)
